Story.title: Social Games
Story.Description: Learn how the play the Game!

Level.title: Sunday - Ego Rising
Level.Description: Yep

Level.title: Tuesday - Stopping the Popular Competition
Level.Description: Monica's frenemy Naomi is ruining her Prom fame. Make sure to bring Naomi down by either getting her to break up or cheat with her current boyfriend, get her to stop being friends with Monica, or get 2 people think she is less cool.

Level.title: Friday - Getting a Date
Level.Description: Oh No! The day of the Prom is approaching fast and Monica doesn't have a boyfriend to be Prom King. Monica will have to find a new boyfriend or else it will be the end of the World.

Level.title: Game Over!
Level.Description: Please reload the webpage to restart the demo.

Story.title: Project Popularstein
Story.Description: After Naomi's previous FAILED makeover, she must try again on new unpopular blood. Help Naomi complete her new makeover project.

Level.title: Operation: Trust Gain
Level.Description: In order to begin this popularity makeover, Naomi must gain the trust of the unfashionable Gunter. To stoop that low, she will have to become his friend, or even go as far as date him.

Level.title: Operation: Rise to Power
Level.Description: Under Naomi's wing, Gunter must go out and make enough friends in order to become the new popular kid in school.

Level.title: Operation: Drop the Baggage
Level.Description: Naomi's tutelage was going successfully, but a major error has occurred. Being friends with Edward is equivalent to social suicide. Something must be done. Gunter must leave this baggage behind on his own, or socially die trying.

Level.title: Game Over!
Level.Description: Please reload the webpage to restart the demo.

Story.title: FoG
Story.Description: We make story for Prom Week

Level.title: Arm Candy
Level.Description: Every king needs a queen. Zack is going to have to score a girlfriend that is totally cool before he stands a chance at becoming prom royalty.

Level.title: Game Over!
Level.Description: Please reload the webpage to restart the demo.

Story.title: PromKing
Story.Description: Zack's a l33t dude, but even his friends say he's obnoxious. (His enemies say things we won't repeat here.) Can your deft social maneuvering crown this ubergeek the Prom King?

Level.title: Who You Know
Level.Description: Getting crowned Prom King isn't just a popularity contest - it's also about playing the judges. Naomi's head of the Prom Committee, so if Zack wants that crown, he'd better make sure she understands how freaking cool he is.

Level.title: Arm Candy
Level.Description: Every king needs a queen. Zack is going to have to score a girlfriend that is totally cool before he stands a chance at becoming prom royalty.

Level.title: The Big Night
Level.Description: OMG, it's the night of the Prom! Everyone looks swank and the air is thick with anticipation (or maybe just cheap cologne). Zack has one last chance to become the Prom King... but how many hearts must break along the way?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh %i%, you did it! You're the Prom %gender(i,King, Queen)%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But of course, %r%. Did you ever doubt me? I never doubted me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, there was that one time when %toc1%...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Silence! My first act as king is to strip that from the yearbook record!
For my second act... I think somebody is getting an upgrade.
You know it, gigababe. You're now.... my tera-babe.
Come, my %gender(r,king,queen)%, let's wave to the little people...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: They look so small from over here...
Oh, %i%, who would have thought the first time we met that one day we'd be crowned prom royalty!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... I couldn't say for both of us, but....
I'm the Prom %gender(i,King, Queen)%! This is everything I ever wanted.
Except.... I always thought I'd have a Prom %if(0,princess)elseif(1,prince)elseif(3,king)else(queen)%...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You will. There must be someone out there for you...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Maybe that someone is closer than either of us realize.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%. There are a million reasons to say no, and only one reason to say yes!

Rule.name: i is female, r is female
i is male, r is male
i is female, r is male

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'd like to thank everyone who helped make this moment possible, the Prom Selection Committee, my friends, %random(whoever invented proms back in the 1960s or whatever,the president of the United States,German expressionism,tofu products in general)%, %random(astronaut ice cream,Superman ice cream,the internet,the Academy)%, %random(the Police Academy,my barber,the circus,the dairy section at our local supermarket)%, %random(our high school,our team mascot,modern medicine,the letter Q)%...
And, uh, my parents and, of course, Mr. Al Garcia! Thank you, good night!

Story.title: They're waiting for you, Gordon. In the TEST Chamber.
Story.Description: Funny that you'd show up today, Gordon. It's a Red Letter Day!

Level.title: AperatureDay: In the Testing Labs
Level.Description: Oh, it's *you*... It's been a looong time. How have you been? I've been *really* busy being dead. You know, after you MURDERED me. Okay, look. We both said a lot of things that you're going to regret. But I think we can put our differences behind us. For Science. You Monster.
